profile.delete_trip_modal_content: Are you sure you want to delete this Trip ? Deleting a Trip will delete all the items you have added to it. The Trip cannot be retrived once it is deleted.

setting.feedback_message: We're always working to improve the TripBFF experience, so we'd love to hear what you love and what you think we can do better.
setting.feedback_submit_message: Submited successfully. Thank you for your feedback!
